attributes.action: Whole Of the UK votes on Scotland Leaving The Union
attributes.additional_details: With all UK residents that are going to be affected by the vote of scottish independence i fell that it is only right in a democracy that all involved parties i.e (Wales, N Ireland and Englad) should also get a vote about weather we should allow the break up of the union - lots are at stake from both sides and it would only be right that all parties should vote on the upcoming vote.
